Producer: Rodrigo Pl치, Laura Santullo, Alejandro De Icaza, Sandino Saravia Vinay, Gabriela Maldonado
Screenwriter: Laura Santullo, Rodrigo Pl치, Laura Santullo, Rodrigo Pl치
Synopsis: Elena is a single mother who relies on Social Services. Her son Tom has behavioral issues and is stigmatized at school as a "problem child" in the border city of El Paso, Texas. An absent father further complicates their difficult relationship. Tom is diagnosed with Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder (ADHD) and prescribed psychiatric medication, but a strange accident alerts his mother as to its side effects. When Elena refuses to continue administering the drugs to Tom, Social Services threaten to remove him from her custody.
Title: The Other Tom
